modName: dark soul black knight armor set
descriptionHtml:
I found this mod accident in the web, but forgot the name of his web.and I think the fans darksoul in skyrim might want to use.
<br /><br />This mod add a new set of Black knight darksoul armor set (body scalable) and all Weapon to the game. They are both un forge-able but upgradable.
<br /><br />THE ARMOR IS AVAILABLE FOR BOTH MALE AND FEMALE, thought it was designed with male in mind i thought some people using female characters might try to use it.So NO BOOB PLATE,NOR REVEALING PARTS,NOR CURVACEOUS BODIES.THIS ARMOR IS UNISEX.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
<br /><br />*Where to find them
<br /><br />
<br /><br />they appear at random place, but i find they In a Locked Chest located on "bonestrewn crest" near world wall.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
<br /><br />*Installation
<br /><br />
<br /><br />To install Just extract the contents(including folders) of this rar file into your Skyrim game folder.Comes with an esp file you can check and uncheck in the launch menu
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
<br /><br />*Term of UseÂ 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />fell free to being modified and/or used in other mods and games without my consent.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />sorry for my bad english couse iam asian
author: web
